body: The day started out fine, but now its kind of ridiculous. I keep timing out and sometimes I'm still in game and we can chat fine, but no one is moving, then everyone times out and it is so annoying. Even the website was down multiple times today. What is going on?
body_tagged: The day started out fine, but now its kind of ridiculous. I keep timing out and sometimes I'm still in game and we can chat fine, but no one is moving, then everyone times out and it is so annoying. Even the website was down multiple times today. What is going on?
title: What happened to Avicus today?

replies.body:
Kim Jong Un's revenge for the Sony incident. 
He's decided to nuke a Minecraft server.
replies.body_tagged:
Kim Jong Un's revenge for the Sony incident. 
He's decided to nuke a Minecraft server.

replies.body: Maybe the website strikes back against spam threads?
replies.body_tagged: Maybe the website strikes back against spam threads?

replies.body: There are already multiple threads answering this questions. Apparently it's the Winter Update, but I can't remember if that's official, and now everyone is saying it's DDoS...
replies.body_tagged: There are already multiple threads answering this questions. Apparently it's the Winter Update, but I can't remember if that's official, and now everyone is saying it's DDoS...

replies.body: We're well of the issue. Please refrain from making threads like these in the future. Thanks! :)
